description: We've brought back these shorts from our archives and updated them with a comfortable drawstring waist and a touch of stretch. This pair is washed and brushed for added softness, making them feel like a broken-in favorite from day one.
fitting_details: All Big sizes have an 8½" inseam. Size Big 2X has 44" waist that expands to 56" and an 11¾" rise.
All Tall sizes have a 9½" inseam. Size Tall 2L has 44" waist that expands to 56" and an 11¾" rise.
Elastic waistband with an interior drawstring. Zip fly with a buttoned closure.
Side on-seam pockets. Two back buttoned pockets.
Signature embroidered Pony at the front left hem.
